gmd:hoursOfService.gco:CharacterString: 8 AM to 5 PM Mountain Standard time (no daylight savings)

gmd:contactInstructions.gco:CharacterString: Fill out contact form at http://www.azgs.az.gov

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: A collection of Web Map Service (WMS) layers created and maintained by the Arizona Geological Survey.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Full URL to request the OGC getCapabilities document. This is the mechanism used to acquire detailed operation description for USGIN metadata.
Base URL for service access; append standard WMS request parameters to compose query.

gmd:explanation.gco:CharacterString: this is where the general data quality statement should go--in the first report element. The concrete data quality (DQ_Quantitative...) element that wraps this is not meaningful in this context

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: This dataset is maintained by the Arizona Geological Survey.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: AZGS information resources may not be reproduced for commercial purposes without explicit written permission from the State Geologist.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Data only to be used for the purposes for which they were collected.
